```{r sphere_sampling, message=FALSE}
library(plotly)
n = 1e3
phi_est = 2*pi*runif(n)
U = runif(n)
theta_est = sapply(U, function(u) acos(1 - 2*u))

x_est = sin(theta_est)*cos(phi_est)
y_est = sin(theta_est)*sin(phi_est)
z_est = cos(theta_est)

theta_est = runif(n, min=0, max=pi)
phi_est = runif(n, min=0, max=2*pi)

x_est_naive = sin(theta_est)*cos(phi_est)
y_est_naive = sin(theta_est)*sin(phi_est)
z_est_naive = cos(theta_est)


plot_ly(x=c(x_est, x_est_naive),
        y=c(y_est, y_est_naive),
        z=c(z_est, z_est_naive),
        color=c(rep(1, n), rep(0, n)),
        colors = colorspace::diverge_hsv(2),
        type="scatter3d", mode="markers", size=0.001)

```
